name: Ventilator shortage
description:
COVID 19 just hit your hometown, you are a doctor in the hospital, there is only one ventilator available for patients, and patients are dying. Within limited time, who will you give it to first?

NYU Game Center prototype studio week 5

Instructor: Bennett Foddy 

Prompt: Utilitarianism.

Press R to restart the game, ESC to quit the game.
